We make the world's most successful smartphone fitness games with over 5 million players. Every day, we receive emails telling us how our games have literally improved our players' health and, in some cases, even saved their lives. Talk about job satisfaction!

Our flagship games, Zombies, Run! and The Walk, combine innovative real-world gameplay with captivating stories and design. We want to find someone who can help us improve and maintain our games so we can help make exercise fun for millions for people.
